item.title: Travel Checklist
item.author: @huatuostudio
item.description: Life is simpler with a checklist. This is what I use before my travels: Travel Documents Check all your travel documentations carefully and contact your travel agencies immediately if you have any queries or problems, Itâ€™s a good idea to have separate copies of all your documents (including passports) to carry and leave a copy of your itinerary with a relative or friend at home, All names on the booking match passport names of all travellers, Frequent flyer number has been advised and used in all bookings.

item.title: Travel Bucket List
item.author: @huatuostudio
item.description: Soak in the Pamukkale thermal pools, Turkey Explore the fascinating Salar de Uyuni salt flats, Bolivia Find paradise on Palawan Island, the Philippines See the spectacular Northern Lights Discover the â€œtemple that is a cityâ€ at Angkor Wat in Cambodia 6. Scale Japanâ€™s highest peak, Mount Fuji Take a trip into the wilderness on an African safari Ascend the arch of Sydney Harbour Bridge Trek the Inca Trail to Machu Picchu

item.title: Sydney Harbour Bridge Climb
item.author: @huatuostudio
item.description: The Experience John has bought me a ticketÂ for a full 3 hours ofÂ Sydney Harbour Bridge ClimbÂ for my birthday this year (thank you John!! ğŸ’• ). I have to say that I have always thought the bridge climb is an overpriced tourist thing. Why would I ever do that if I live here?! :) Nevertheless, I was excited to wake up at 3am to get ready for the bridge climb.
